org.dejava.component.i18n.message.handler

Interface ApplicationMessageHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MessageHandler

    public interface ApplicationMessageHandler
extends MessageHandler
    Helps handling internationalization messages in a application environment.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String addMessage(ApplicationMessageType type, String key, Object[] parametersValues)
      Adds a message with the given key and parameters values of the defined type to the application.
      String addMessage(String key, Object[] parametersValues)
      Adds a message with the given key and parameters values of the defined type to the application.
      String addMessage(String type, String key, Object[] parametersValues)
      Adds a message with the given key and parameters values of the defined type to the application.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.dejava.component.i18n.message.handler.MessageHandler

    • Method Detail

      • addMessage

        String addMessage(String key,
                Object[] parametersValues)
                  throws MessageNotFoundException,
                         org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException
        Adds a message with the given key and parameters values of the defined type to the application.
        Parameters:
        key - Key for the message in the bundle.
        parametersValues - Parameter values for the message.
        Returns:
        A message with the given key and parameters values of the defined type.
        Throws:
        MessageNotFoundException - If the message cannot be added to the application.
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException - If any of the parameters values are not valid.

      • addMessage
